content.question: Which of the following is played?

choices.label: One measure in three-four. Eighth E3, eighth D3, quarter A2, quarter B2.
One measure in three-four. Eighth E3, eighth D3, quarter A2, quarter B-flat2.
One measure in three-four. Eighth E3, eighth D3, quarter G2, quarter B2.
One measure in three-four. Eighth E3, eighth D3, quarter G2, quarter B-flat2.

content.answer: One measure in three-four. Eighth E3, eighth D3, quarter G2, quarter B2.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in performed music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
